text:
:sparkles:Hey all, exciting news for you out of INBOUND today! You can now get early access to *build app cards powered by UI extensions*!:sparkles:

:arrow_right: All the details can be found here <https://developers.HubSpot.com/build-app-cards|https://developers.HubSpot.com/build-app-cards>

Hey - I believe we used to have the option to trigger a re-sync to a dev sandbox.
Am I being silly, or did it disappear?

ok!
I've resolved by myself.
I leave my solution for someone who can have the same need.

I've found these source:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-components/crm-data-components>
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-components/crm-action-components>

I've tested them and _et voil√†_  it works like I want.

Yes, it's possible if you click the link under the column "Creation Details".
Mine says 26 changes synced. Then I can click "back to all sync activity" on the panel that opens. From there, I could find "Set up sync"

Hope this helps...
